Description: Body sherd of Chian Grand Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky black with two added white bands above a possible rosette with alternating added red and white petals; exterior: painted decoration consisting of part of red chiton with border of red dots between dilute lines.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0730) (phase 2)
